column5: Programme descriptionAre you ready to explore some of the world's most pressing challenges?Understand the link between the environment, development agendas, and global inequalities for today and the future.Our MSc Environment and Development enables you to critically evaluate the multiple dimensions of the inter-relationship between development and the environment, with an abiding concern for social and environmental justice.What will I learn?Our teaching approach encourages you to reflect upon your role as both researchers and professionals in transformations towards social and environmental justice, considering the ethics of engagement in an unequal world.
